pages.text: This mod expands upon Minecraft's zombie mechanics.

pages.name: Zombie Chicken
pages.text: The eggs it lays are already rotten!$(br)

pages.name: Zombie Cow
pages.text: It's rotten udders produce spoiled milk.$(br)

pages.name: Zombie Pig
pages.text: Can be steered around using a porkchop on a stick!$(br)

pages.name: Zombie Sheep
pages.text: The wool is matted and rotten!$(br)

pages.name: Zombie Cat
pages.text: Can gift its owner candies in the morning!$(br)
